name: Shadow Guy
description:
Get started! Your adventure has only just begun.

Mixing action, adventure and strategy, I invite you to Shadow guy.

You will not be disappointed with the trip.

Shadow guy - Run it if you can, the game is a very interesting runner's game.....

If you love platformer games or adventure games, then Shadow guy is the best suit! As it comes among the top platform games and adventure games on Android!

With easy to play controls even kids can master this extremely fun and simple game.

With achievements to give you a challenge in the FREE and all new Shadow guy

Game Features :-

    * Free Game

    * 6 Seasons

    * Excellent physique

    * 100+ Levels

    * Offline Game

    * Easy access

    * Extraordinary VFX effects

    * Super Game play

    * Smooth controls

    * Completely free. No in-app purchases.

Download Now, Enjoy Now, Succeed now.....
